markdownRemark.html: Hope you guys liked it. If you liked the project give it a star on Github.

info.idea: The project aims to develop a platform that connects service providers and users, allowing easy service search, booking, payment management, and real-time status updates. Service providers can manage services, track bookings, and update statuses, while users can book services, make payments, and receive notifications. With role-based access, the platform offers different interfaces for service providers and users. Gmail authentication ensures secure login and signup. Built with Python and Django, the platform delivers a seamless experience for both parties.
